ModMetaData.name: GrimWorld 40,000 - Unfiltered Rage
ModMetaData.author: Clashgore, Tittymcswaggy, Alite, Abomination, sk4p3g04t, Sandwish
ModMetaData.description: Behold, the One Angry Chair, the greatest melee weapon ever beheld by the legendary Angry Marines. No Khornate Berserker could ever hope to match the impossible-potent, impossibly-pure rage of one who would wield this deadly weapon, this Excalibur of chairs. \n\n"ALWAYS ANGRY! ALL THE TIME!"
